text: The 2017 nine-pin bowling World Team Championships were the seventh edition of the team championships and held in Dettenheim, Germany, from 19 May to 27 May 2017. In men's tournament Serbia secured gold medal, while in women's tournament world champion title was captured by host Germany. ==Schedule== Two competitions were held.Schedule All time are local (UTC+2). {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! title: 2017 nine-pin bowling World Team Championships
